meanings.sent1: The grant was nonrepayable, meaning we didn't have to give the money back.
meanings.sent2: The scholarship was nonrepayable, so I didn't have to worry about returning the funds.
meanings.sent3: It was like receiving a nonrepayable gift from a generous friend.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was a nonrepayable treasure that I will always cherish.
meanings.sent5: The nonrepayable debt of gratitude I owe to my mentor is immeasurable.

meanings.sent1: The nonrepayable loan helped us start our business without the pressure of paying it back.

meanings.sent4: Her love was a nonrepayable gift that enriched my life.
meanings.sent5: The nonrepayable favor she did for me will always be remembered.
